ygData.subject: Re: possible cheat... Off topic - Longish
ygData.msgSnippet: there own server?  could you give me(us) more information about this please? hehehe...it d be neato to have my own server for just me and my friends ;) no
ygData.messageBody:
there own server? could you give me(us) more information about this please?
hehehe...it'd be neato to have my own server for just me and my friends ;)
no $10/mo either.

hmmm...interesting...

please give me all the info you can or point me somewhere where I can get
the info.

thanks,
Omeg

PS..could they interact with NPCs at all or just walk around?

>Why is everyone assuming that the datastream is encrypted? Within
>a month of attempting it another group had an everquest *SERVER* >emulator
>that was able to have a client walk around the world and see >monsters that
>they spawned. Surely you don't think they had time to >break ANY encoding
>and *STILL* be able to analyize the protocol to >the point of having a
>working server do you?
